message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $9,500. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to pay a bit less.  How about $9,000?  This would still be a good deal for you and gets me closer to my target price.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. How about we meet in the middle at $9,250?
